long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flashcards and Notes is a quick and accessible way to create and manage notes and information. Your flashcards and notes are completely private and are stored locally.

Features:
 - Creating and removing sets, terms, and multiple definitions
 - Searching and editing sets, terms, and definitions
 - Downloading and uploading all your information in case you lose data
    - This can also be used to share your flashcards and notes with others
